synopsis.text:
News of a formidable enemy reaches Earth as "Apostles" from Planet Cray make their descent, bent on wreaking havoc. The Dragon Deity of Destruction, Gyze, with its unparalleled destructive power, serves as the Apostles' primary weapon. Their ultimate goal is to revive Gyze by harnessing the might of the six Zeroth Dragons.

Unaware of the impending danger, Chrono and his team return to their everyday lives following the end of U20. Meanwhile, Noa makes a comeback. Little do they know that they will soon be embroiled in a final showdown against the Apostles and the Dragon Deity of Destruction.

As the story unfolds, the Vanguards must rise to the challenge and confront their destiny head-on. The power of unity and camaraderie will be their greatest asset in this battle to save Earth and secure the future. The time has come for the Vanguard fighters to stand tall and protect their world from the looming threat.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
